title: P4Engine - Bubble Bobble
description: A game engine & game made from scratch for the programming 4 course. Using modern C++ & Game Programming Patterns.

title: PPMEdit
description: A custom level editor for my custom engine. Inspired by PICO-8's P8PNG cartridge format.

title: PROTO-CALL
description: A WIP game about networking and routing packets to the right destination. Made using C and the Raylib library.

title: Voice of the Ocean
description: A single player action-adventure game based on exploration and unique mechanics using the player's voice.

title: Voxel Editor
description: A procedural voxel world generator and editor

title: BoomBastic
description: Co-op game with mechanics based on hot potato

title: Dual Rasterizer
description: A combination rasterizer, software and hardware.

title: Raytracer
description: A software ray tracer with BVH optimization
